title: At least 24 dead and hundreds of thousands of homes without power in brutal US storm
description: At least 24 people have died in the US as the country grapples with a brutal winter storm.

title: Pope rebukes those 'ravenous' for power in annual Christmas Eve mass
description: The Pope has used his Christmas Eve mass to rebuke those who are "ravenous" for wealth and power and decry war, poverty and consumerism.

title: Taliban ban Afghan women from working at NGOs
description: The Taliban have banned Afghan women from working at non-governmental organisations in the country.

title: Protesters clash with police in Paris after three killed in shooting
description: Protesters have clashed with police in Paris during demonstrations after three people were shot dead at a Kurdish cultural centre.

title: Heavy snowfall causes 13 dead and more than 10,000 homes without power in Japan
description: Recent snowfall across several regions in Japan has killed 13, injured more than 80 and left more than 10,000 households without power, says authorities.

title: 'The Serpent' killer Charles Sobhraj arrives back in France
description: Convicted killer Charles Sobhraj has arrived in France after being released from prison in Nepal.

title: Fire at unregistered Russian care home kills 20
description: Twenty people are dead after a fire at an unregistered care home in Siberia.
